footer.chaynDescription: Bloom is brought to you by Chayn, a global non-profit, run by survivors and allies from around the world, creating resources to support the healing of survivors of gender-based violence.

404.title: 404 - Página no encontrada
404.authenticatedDescription: No se pudo encontrar la página. Revisa la url o vuelve a la página de cursos
404.unauthenticatedDescription: TNo se pudo encontrar la página. Revisa la url o vuelve a la página de bienvenida
404.authenticatedRedirectButton: Regresar a la página de cursos
404.unauthenticatedRedirectButton: Regresar a la página de bienvenida

500.title: 500 - Error interno
500.description: Hmm, algo no va bien. Por favor, vuelve atrás e inténtalo de nuevo. Envíanos un mensaje a través del formulario de contacto si el error persiste.
500.authenticatedRedirectButton: Regresar a la página de cursos
500.unauthenticatedRedirectButton: Regresar a la página de bienvenida

alt.bloomHead: Illustration of a person's face and shoulders, with big leaves and flowers blooming above them
alt.leafMix: Illustration of two leaves joined with a rose
alt.leafMixBee: Illustration of two leaves with a bee hovering above
alt.personTea: Illustration of a person sitting, holding a tea
alt.chooseTherapist: Illustration of a side profile of a person's face, with a flower
alt.dateSelector: Illustration of a calendar with a heart in the middle
alt.change: Illustration of a cycle - three suns in a circle with arrows between them
alt.confidential: Illustration of a document with a lock in the corner
